title: are the gals REALLY bffs? let’s see….
itunes:title: are the gals REALLY bffs? let’s see….
description:
Brooke and Danielle are back in the studio this week and doing a “BFF TEST” to see who knows who best!  The gals also catch up on what they have been up to this summer.  Brooke is sharing more on her recent GLAMPING experience, and Danielle is sharing more on her upcoming move!   Enjoy the episode and be sure to tag @galsonthegopodcast in your listening selfies and stories on Instagram!

Please support the show by checking out our sponsors!

Athletic Greens: Athletic Greens is going to give you a FREE 1 year supply of immune-supporting Vitamin D AND 5 FREE travel packs with your first purchase when you visit athleticgreens.com/GALS

BetterHelp: Our listeners get 10% off their first month at BetterHelp.com/GALS

HoneyLove: Get 20% off your second item, PLUS an ADDITIONAL 10% off at Honeylove.com, with code GOTG
SHOP GOTG MERCH!  https://fanjoy.co/collections/gals-on-the-go  


GOTG jams playlist https://open.spotify.com/playlist/1vQ4FvPya39ff8SOGK9Dg9?si=87f7bd7fbc4445fd 


GOTG YouTube Channel (watch full episodes with video!)  https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCkCy3xcN257Hb_VWWU5C5vA  


Gals On The Go Instagram https://www.instagram.com/galsonthegopodcast/  

Brooke’s Youtube Channel https://www.youtube.com/brookemiccio  
Brooke’s Instagram https://www.instagram.com/brookemiccio/  

Danielle’s Youtube Channel https://www.youtube.com/c/daniellecarolan  
Danielle’s Instagram https://www.instagram.com/daniellecarolan/
